station.name: The Radiator, 105.9FM
station.longDesc: ‘The Radiator’ is a nonprofit listener-supported media center generating and transmitting programming that fosters community awareness and civic engagement in Burlington, VT. The Radiator is operated by Big Heavy World, a volunteer-staffed music office that archives and promotes the music of Vermont, bigheavyworld.com.
